plot: Christopher is a young man that has been left behind by society after the tragic loss of his wife and daughter at the hands of a local crime boss. He Hastily decides to follow his childhood friend into the employ of the Giardino crime family. It's not long before questions start to arise. Who can you trust and how can you see a betrayal coming in a world that is based on a perfect mixture of loyalty and dishonesty? Now Christopher must struggle to gain the trust of his new employers, whilst keeping a watchful eye on those people closest to him and at the same time, protect his own, dark, secrets.   Written by  Anonymous
title: Tell No Tales
